function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Stigmatization of public and social housing residents in the media and public life","Impact":"Increased reluctance of residents to seek medical assistance or follow public health guidelines","Mitigation":"Public education campaigns to challenge stigmatization and promote community solidarity","Technologies":"Social media platforms and community engagement tools","People":"Public and social housing residents, marginalized communities","Owner":"Public health authorities, community organizations"},{"Description":"Linking public housing to highly publicized COVID-19 'cruise ship' cases","Impact":"Risk of further stigmatization and discrimination against public housing residents","Mitigation":"Media guidelines to avoid sensationalism and biased reporting, public health campaigns to educate the public about the realities of public housing","Technologies":"Media monitoring tools, public health communication platforms","People":"Public and social housing residents, general public","Owner":"Media organizations, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Perception of public housing lockdown as a 'detainment' rather than a public health measure","Impact":"Undermining of trust in government and public health authorities, resistance to future lockdown measures","Mitigation":"Transparent communication about the reasons for the lockdown, engagement of residents in decision-making processes","Technologies":"Community engagement platforms, transparent communication channels","People":"Public and social housing residents, government authorities","Owner":"Public health authorities, government"}]}
